faq.title: Frequently Asked Questions
faq.question1: How do credits convert to reviews?
faq.answer1: 1 credit equals 1 ebook review, and 2 credits equal 1 audiobook review. Audiobooks require more credits because they demand more time and effort from readers.
faq.answer2: Credits must be activated (allocated to a campaign) within 30, 90, or 120 days based on your package size. Once a campaign is created, it runs until completion with no time limit.
faq.answer3: Unused credits can be refunded within 14 days of purchase. Once credits are allocated to a campaign, they become non-refundable.
faq.question4: What payment methods do you accept?
faq.answer4: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and digital wallets through our secure Stripe payment gateway.
faq.question5: Can I purchase credits for multiple books?
faq.answer5: Yes! Credits are added to your account balance and can be allocated to any of your campaigns.
